name: kali Linux
description: Kali Linux is an open-source, Debian-based Linux distribution geared towards various information security tasks, such as Penetration Testing, Security Research, Computer Forensics and Reverse Engineering.

name: TryHackMe
description: TryHackMe provides a hands on cybersecurity skill experience in real world.

name: HackTheBox
description: HackTheBox platform provide learning experience with project on real world issue in cyber security and ethical hacking.

name: Cybrary
description: Cybrary is accessible, affordable training platform provides curated career paths in cybersecurity, threat-informed training, and certification preparation.
